subject: p13263843
History: Evaluation of the patient with COPD and history of lung cancer after right upper lobectomy with recurrent pneumonia.
Findings: PA and lateral upright chest radiographs were reviewed in comparison to. The PICC line tip is at the level of mid SVC. Pleural effusion is demonstrated on the right, but substantially decreased after placement of the pigtail catheter. Left pleural effusion is unchanged. The patient is in mild interstitial pulmonary edema.
